about_the_game:
PuPaiPo Space is a colorful space shoot-em-up in which you travel from Stage to Stage in search of the legendary space pizza. Piloting your trusty spaceship, you will have to battle waves of opponents, dodge hundreds of bullets, pick sweet power ups and face powerful bosses!

Travel through 7 different stages. Jumping from one stage to another requires your space jumping engine to recharge for roughly 90 seconds. During that time you will have to defend yourself from all the opponents in the area and defeat its boss.

Up to 4 players can play locally to tackle this journey together.

Controls are quite simple:
Move (up,down,left,right) and you can either Aim & Shoot or use the new experimental technology known as Auto-Shoot.

If you are in a pinch, you can also use bombs to deal massive damage and destroy any bullets in your surroundings. However, you have a limited amount of bombs, so use them wisely!

NEW GAME MODES
Once you beat the game in any difficulty, you will gain access to two new game modes!

BOSS RUSH
Fight all the bosses in the game one after another, are you up to the task?

SURVIVAL
Survive waves and waves of opponents for as long as you can, put your piloting skills to the test!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game has an option to turn the art style to "PIXEL" which uses less resources and runs better in less powerful systems.

name: PuPaiPo Space Deluxe

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x84/x64
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 210 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game has an option to turn the art style to "PIXEL" which uses less resources and runs better in less powerful systems.

short_description: Hop into your spaceship and battle waves of opponents in your journey to find the legendary space pizza! Now 100% more Deluxe than ever!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Portuguese - Portugal
